# The `BinaryOpIntrinsic` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This class represents an intrinsic that is based on a binary operation. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

This class represents an intrinsic that is based on a binary operation.

This includes op.with.overflow and saturating add/sub intrinsics.

Definition at line 890 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/intrinsicinst-h">IntrinsicInst.h</a>.
